subject: Invitation to join SIMSONN
description_text:
Hi service@simsonn.com,
simsonn447@gmail.com invited you to join the SIMSONN group.
https://groups.google.com/d/forum/simsonn

Google Groups allows you to create and participate in online forums and
email-based groups with a rich community experience. You can also use
your Group to share documents, pictures, calendars, invitations, and other  
resources.


Accept this invitation at:  
https://groups.google.com/forum/subscribe?token=AHZ7KVOlLebKwcIpagZYQ2i83lrDPXhEQFnLD-OD7u6t2Q9w93YKmONDKrLT8eLNro4h4U6c7UoISdx49WQHz7AH3jLqc6fdOA
If you do not wish to be a member of this group or believe this group may  
contain spam:
* You can report this group for abuse at  
https://groups.google.com/d/abuse/AJmrmCtjDQr3x14HB5LFldGjx0gGL74FIsNO8vAGshFexwdXeoyskdcuEekh0O1q0ANkCK2BjK5Igq3sekkPUoLMZSkfdgso6ZLbCU2Xk1qs6cTefLfh59NJ6vvINbmB0MQbOuP-PfP8
* You can opt out of all future Google Groups activity at  
https://groups.google.com/d/optout

Visit Google Groups Help Center at  
https://support.google.com/groups/answer/46601?hl=en.
